premise: How did the fall of the main body of China's FA.ST "500-meter Spherical Radio Telescope" arouse warm attention at home and abroad? premise: The reason why piezoelectric ceramics can generate electricity is that each tiny grain of this ceramic has spontaneous polarization that can be permanently stored.Under the action of a strong external electric field, it will be aligned in the direction of the electric field, making the entire crystal polar.They can induce electrical phenomena externally due to changes in stress or temperature.The greater the applied stress, the higher the frequency of change, and the greater the power generation.High energy conversion efficiency can be obtained at the resonance frequency.Piezoelectricity with high voltage and a small current is required For the power supply, block piezoelectric ceramics can be used; for piezoelectric power supplies with low voltage and large current, thin-film piezoelectric ceramics can be used for integration.At present, the literature reports that there are various products for various types of charging power supplies.It is characterized by its small size and lightweight, which can be carried with it, especially in high mountainous areas or deserts without a power source.It can use a variety of mechanical power and stored power to generate electricity, which is not affected by magnetic fields or nuclear radiation.Aging.
hypothesis: The piezoelectric ceramic power supply can use mechanical force to generate electricity without interference from the external electric field

premise: There are many new technologies born in the field of thermal power, and the combined cycle technology is one of them.In simple terms, the combined cycle technology is "one gas and two uses": the high-temperature exhaust gas discharged from the gas turbine is recovered and converted into steam by the waste heat boiler and enters the steam turbine.After driving it to run, both turbines transmit kinetic energy to the generator to generate electricity; the exhaust gas enters the boiler again, which further converts the thermal energy contained in it into kinetic energy and reduces the temperature of the final exhaust gas.This is not only environmentally friendly but also saves fuel.In addition to high power generation efficiency, fast start-up speed is also a great advantage of combined cycle technology.Its working principle is to shut down the slow-running steam turbine at the beginning of a startup, and only start the gas turbine to generate sufficient heat before switching to combined cycle mode.This feature is very useful for large cities with frequent power emergency incidents.
hypothesis: Steam turbine starts earlier than gas turbine

premise: The role of silver iodide in artificial rainfall is meteorologically called cold cloud catalysis.When heated, silver iodide forms extremely fine (only one to one-thousandth of the hair diameter) silver iodide when heated.Particles.1g of silver iodide can form tens of trillions of microparticles.These particles will enter the cloud with the movement of airflow, generating tens of trillions to trillions of ice crystals in cold clouds.Therefore, the use of silver iodide to catalyze rainfall does not require airplanes, equipment It is simple, with very little usage and low cost, and can be promoted on a large scale.

premise: The Grand Canal involves the two ancient cultures of the Yellow River and the Yangtze River, the core area of civilization, and is connected to important cultural areas in Chinese history, such as Yan Culture, Qilu Culture, and Wu Yue Culture.Its coasts are areas where ancient China has a concentrated population and dense cultural sites.Throughout the ages, the Grand Canal has left rich cultural monuments.It is known as the "Ancient Cultural Corridor", and its cultural relics are of extraordinary value and significance.Not only that, the length of the Grand Canal has been excavated and it has also set a new era.The record of disdain for the world, especially the dozens of cities along the coast with unique cultural landscapes and folk customs, has preserved the extremely characteristic inland river culture.However, the Grand Canal, which is the crystallization of the wisdom and creativity of the Chinese people, is not included in the country today.No major cultural relics protection unit has a special law and law without prejudice affirming and guaranteeing its historical status.The status of the protection of the Grand Canal is worrying.In addition to thousands of years of riverbank breaches, silting, water shortage and another natural In addition, there are more chaotic expenditure channels, intercepting the flow of water, and unreasonable human factors.Because many rivers use natural lakes and natural rivers, many people do not recognize the Grand Canal.It is also the case that cultural heritage or cultural relics and historic sites are randomly renovated due to local interests when they are three years old.The management system by province also makes it impossible to form a comprehensive and comprehensive plan for the protection of the Grand Canal.

premise: How did the fall of the main body of China's FA.ST "500-meter Spherical Radio Telescope" arouse warm attention at home and abroad? The reason lies in its three high-energy stunts.One is to look far.According to the current largest radio telescope, FA.ST can theoretically receive electromagnetic signals beyond 13.7 billion light years.The second is very flexible.The structure of the cable network can change with the movement of the celestial body, which drives 4450 reflection units on the cable network to form a 300-meter-diameter instantaneous paraboloid in the direction of the radio power source, which greatly improves the observation efficiency.The third is of high accuracy.The 500-meter FA.ST radio telescope The structure has millimeter-level accuracy requirements everywhere; the processing accuracy of each of the more than 7,000 arm-thick steel cables used to weave the cable net is controlled within one millimeter; the final 500-meter antenna accuracy is 3 millimeters, and the precision of each small panel is 1.5 millimeters.All of this means that we will be able to observe the more hidden mysteries of the universe.

premise: There are many new technologies born in the field of thermal power, and the combined cycle technology is one of them.In simple terms, the combined cycle technology is "one gas and two uses": the high-temperature exhaust gas discharged from the gas turbine is recovered and converted into steam by the waste heat boiler and enters the steam turbine.After driving it to run, both turbines transmit kinetic energy to the generator to generate electricity; the exhaust gas enters the boiler again, which further converts the thermal energy contained in it into kinetic energy and reduces the temperature of the final exhaust gas.This is not only environmentally friendly but also saves fuel.In addition to high power generation efficiency, fast start-up speed is also a great advantage of combined cycle technology.Its working principle is to shut down the slow-running steam turbine at the beginning of a startup, and only start the gas turbine to generate sufficient heat before switching to combined cycle mode.This feature is very useful for large cities with frequent power emergency incidents.

premise: Light exposure can help alleviate winter depression.Researchers have studied nine patients who all suffered from winter depression due to shorter winter days.Researchers exposed the patients to strong light with floral fragrance for three hours in the morning and three hours in the evening.Within a week, seven patients completely got rid of depression and the other two showed significant improvement.As the light could induce the body to mistakely think that summer is coming, winter depression was cured.
